name: Meow Clicker (JaxterMG)
description:
I wish iIcould make webgl build, but I could't because webgl does not support FFT which I used for getting music frequencies to sync every anymation in game.

Cute cats are dancing around fish bowl and all of that in clicker with AWESOME music. Try this out!
